attributes.action: Hold a People's Vote on Prime Minister's Brexit Deal
attributes.additional_details:
Theresa May has put this deal forward and has then delayed her own deal as the opposition of a minority government would make this deal fail. 
In 2016 people did not know what Brexit was. It is now only just that the people of Great Britain have a vote on the Prime Minister's deal which could be Brexit.
attributes.background: The Brexit deal that the Prime Minister has put forward has been delayed due to its inevitable failure in the House of Commons. Is it not right for the people to have their own vote on what Brexit could be?
